definition: (completed action marker)/(modal particle indicating change of state, situation now)/(modal particle intensifying preceding clause)
to finish/to achieve/variant of 瞭|了[liao3]/to understand clearly
but/yet/however/while/to go back/to decline/to retreat/nevertheless/even though
to die/to be done with this world
to settle/to finish/to conclude/to wind up
but/yet/however/while/to go back/to decline/to retreat/nevertheless/even though
to release (tension)/relief (from suspense)/to dispel (usu. with negative, unable to forget)
to do something to sb/to deal with/to cope/how?/to no avail

(indicates that sth turns out just the opposite of what one would wish) unfortunately/as it happened/(indicates that sth is the opposite of what would be normal or reasonable) stubbornly/contrarily/against reason/(indicates that sb or a group is singled out) precisely/only/of all people
it is a pity/what a pity/unfortunately
one's whole heart/from the bottom of one's heart
